thread.title: Pujara's 17th Double Century Leads Saurashtra's Dominance in Ranji Trophy Match against Jharkhand - timenews
thread.title_full: Pujara's 17th Double Century Leads Saurashtra's Dominance in Ranji Trophy Match against Jharkhand - timenews

author: time news
title: Pujara's 17th Double Century Leads Saurashtra's Dominance in Ranji Trophy Match against Jharkhand - timenews
text: 2024-01-07 20:54:00 Pujara’s double century leads Saurashtra to dominate Ranji Trophy match Saurashtra’s Cheteshwar Pujara’s outstanding performance has led his team to dominate their Group A Ranji Trophy match against Jharkhand. Pujara scored his 17th double century in the match held in Rajkot, finishing with an unbeaten 243 runs. In the first innings, Jharkhand were all out for just 142 runs in 49 overs, while Saurashtra finished with an impressive 578/4 in 156 overs. Jharkhand managed to score 140/2 in the second innings. In another match, Maharashtra secured a strong victory over Manipur, beating them by an innings and 69 runs in Solapur. Meanwhile, in the Group C match between Gujarat and Tamil Nadu in Valsad, Gujarat was seen dominating the game. In the first innings, Gujarat were all out for 236 runs, while Tamil Nadu managed to score 250 runs. In the second innings, Gujarat put up 312 runs before being all out, and Tamil Nadu were swinging with 32/2 runs. Pujara’s remarkable performance and Saurashtra’s dominance in the Group A match have set the stage for an exciting continuation of the Ranji Trophy. #Ranji #Trophy #Pujaras #17th #double #century
